name: Pepperoni Monkey Bread
author: AMH
summary: This is just a spin on pepperoni bread.
ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian salad dressing mix
24  frozen bread rolls (such as Bridgford®), thawed and cut into 3 pieces
1 ½ (8 ounce) packages pepperoni, sliced and quartered
1 (8 ounce) package mozzarella cheese, cut into small cubes
2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a fluted tube pan (such as Bundt®) with cooking spray
Mix olive oil, Italian dressing mix, and garlic together in a large bowl
Flatten each dough piece with your fingers
Add 3 pieces of pepperoni and 2 cubes of mozzarella cheese; wrap dough around filling to form a ball
Transfer to the bowl with the olive oil mixture; mix until coated
Arrange half of the dough balls around the bottom of the tube pan
Scatter pepperoni and mozzarella on top
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese and oregano on top
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese melts, about 15 minutes
Uncover and continue baking until golden brown, 10 to 15 minutes
Cool in the pan for 5 minutes
